about_the_game:
The near future. The Great Arion Empire, led by the wise and just Empress Rovena, protects peace and order on Earth and hundreds of other planets. But one of the commanders of the elite Space Marine squad, known for his unpredictability and propensity for violence, disobeyed orders, defied the Empire and went over to the rebels. That commander is you. Now, as a rebel, you find yourself in a deadly game against the full might of the Empire, and your chances of survival are close to zero.

Stellar Raven is a single-player first-person shooter in the tank simulator genre. The game is a futuristic action experience where you control a high-tech flying tank and engage in intense battles against enemy forces on different planets.

Gameplay:

  • You control the flying tank from a first-person perspective, battling enemies on various planets.

  • The main objective is to destroy all enemy forces on each level and ultimately defeat the final boss, Empress Rovena.

  • You will need to travel through and conquer several distinct planets, each with its own unique challenges, enemies, and environmental hazards, making every level a different tactical experience.

  • Your tank has access to various weapons, including standard laser cannons and more powerful weapons that can be picked up throughout the levels.

Gameplay Mechanics:

  • You control the flying tank from a first-person perspective, navigating 3D environments. The HUD (Heads-Up Display) shows your health, radar, energy levels, and ammunition.

  • The primary weapon is a laser cannon with unlimited ammunition, but you also have access to powerful, limited-use weapons like drons and missiles.

  • A radar system helps you detect enemy positions, allowing you to plan your attacks and evade threats. The radar is especially useful when enemies are off-screen, helping you strategize in real time.

  • Each planet culminates in a boss battle, involving a larger enemy tank that requires specific tactics to defeat.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce MX150
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050Ti or AMD Radeon RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: On a flying laser tank, fight the armed forces of the Empire and, after overcoming several planets, meet the Empress and fight her in a mortal battle.
